publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1364 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Tweed Forum-That the Parliament congratulates the Tweed Forum on its Bridging the Border Education Project, a project that helps young people to enjoy and understand their natural and cultural heritage; notes that the work of the forum involves educational activities and events for young people, youth leaders and teachers; further notes the innovative way in which this project combines environmental awareness with educational activities, and urges the Scottish Executive to support all similar projects that have both educational and emotional benefits for youth leaders and young people.
